name: Mashed Potatoes
info: Mashed potatoes are made by mashing boiled potatoes. They are often served with gravy or butter. Mashed potatoes are a common side dish in many cultures and can be flavored with various herbs and spices.

name: French Fries
info: French fries are deep-fried potato strips. They are a popular fast food item and are often served with ketchup or mayonnaise. French fries can be seasoned with salt, pepper, or other spices.

name: Baked Potatoes
info: Baked potatoes are potatoes baked whole. They can be served with a variety of toppings such as sour cream, cheese, bacon bits, and chives. Baked potatoes are a hearty and filling dish.
